msContents.summary:
This is a commentary on the first section i.e, Bālakāṇḍa of the epic Rāmāyaṇa. It is written by Govindarāja. The author has named separate commentary on each section.
The initial folio of the manuscript are not in order. The second folio of the image 9 in the digitized manuscript is the beginning of the manuscript. The continuation is image 10 folio 2. After the first blank folio on the verso has verses from the 15th chapter of the Bālakāṇḍa and the last line is from the commentary.
kausalyāyai narapatiḥ pāyasārdhaṃ dadau tadā ardhād ardhaṃ dadau cāpi sumitrāyai narādhipaḥ kaikeyyai cāvaśiṣṭārdhaṃ dadau putrārthakāraṇāt pradadau cāvaśiṣṭārdhaṃ pāyasasyā
mṛtopamam 1.015.027a anucintya sumitrāyai punar eva mahīpatiḥ evaṃ tāsāṃ dadau rājā bhāryāṇāṃ pāyasaṃ pṛthak ||
viṣṇorardhaṁ samnvitau puṣye jātasya bharato minalagne prassannadhiḥ | sārpe jātau ca saumitrī kulirebhyudite ravau || rāja

a ya namaḥ śuklāṁbaradharaṁ viṣṇuṁ śaśivarṇañcaturbhujaṁ | prasannavadanandhyāyet sarvavighnopaśāntaye || ācāryaṁ śaṭhakopadeśikamatha prācāryapāraṁpārīṁ śrīmallakṣmaṇayogivaryayamunāvāstavyanāthādikān vālmikiṁ sa
ha nāradena muninā vākdevatāvalabhaṁ sītālakṣamaṇavāyusunusahitaṁ śrīrāmacandraṁ bhaje | śrīmatyañjanabhūdharasya śikhare śrīmārutessannidhāvagre veṁkaṭanāyakasya sadanadvāre yatikṣmābhṛtaḥ | nānādeśasamāgataiḥ budhagaṇaiḥ rāmāya
ṇavyākriyāṁ vistīrṇāṁ racayeti sādaramahaṁ svapne smi sañcoditaḥ |
mūrtibhedenopamānatvaṁ | atīva atiśayena śuśubhe reje tulyānurāgasyātiśayitakāmasya bhogasamṛddhihetutvāditi bhāvaḥ | īti śrīmadrā(marginal [mā]) yaṇabhuṣaṇe bālakāṇḍasyākhyāne maṇi
mañjirākhyāne saptasaptatitamassargaḥ śrīmate rāmānujāya namaḥ sītālakṣmaṇabharataśatrughnahanumatsametaśrīrāmacandraparabrahmaṇe namaḥ | hariḥ oṁ śubamastu || (at the centre of the folio) śrīnivāsamahāgurave namaḥ ||
